channel.title: certification on harre.dev
channel.description: Recent content in certification on harre.dev

item.title: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Certified Developer
item.description: With all the knowledge built up for my CFCD exam I did earlier I took another Cloud Foundry exam. The Pivotal flavor this time. Not as involved as the other Cloud Foundry exam I did but still a wide variety of questions. I’m not sure if I screwed up all the Metrics questions, or that there was only 1 that I got incorrect. Still really happy with the result.

item.title: Cloud Foundry Certified Developer
item.description: Hey look, I got certified in something :-) After a good few nights of self-paced training and practice over at Pivotal I felt confident enough and took the CFCD exam. As you can see above, I passed!
